kw.name: Wait for Latest Booking Confirmation
kw.msg:
Return: '
Your booking number:
146966528

Now let's check in!

NelsonAdmin
Arrival Departure
4 PM Sep 21 2023 12 noon Sep 22 2023
CHECK-IN

Hello NelsonAdmin,

There’s something you need to know because Omena is not an ordinary hotel:

1. Omena has no reception, so you can go straight to your room.

2. Your door code is the key to your room.

3. To get your door code and room number, you need to check-in online.

kw.name: Wait for Latest Booking Confirmation
kw.msg:
Return: '
Your booking number:
733022650

Welcome to Kensington Stay!

Nelson
Arrival Departure
4 PM Sep 28 2023 11 AM Sep 29 2023
CHECK-IN

Thank you for choosing Kensington Stay!

A few things you need to know before your arrival:

- Online check in is compulsory for all guests.

- The code for the Entrance door is 4321.

- Your Room Number and Wi-Fi details will be sent to you on the day of your arrival.

- Room service and linen change are once every 2 days.

- Feel free to dispose of any rubbish in the bin next to the door in the laundry room basement level.

Note that Kensington Stay is a non-smoking hotel. Only people registered at the hotel room can enter the building. People not complying with this rule can be escorted out by security. There is a 24/7 security surveillance at the hotel premises. If you need help, please call our customer service number

Hope you have a wonderful stay with us!

See you soon!

Kensington Stay

Full Kensington Stay experience

2 more hours of sleep?
Check if early arrival or late departure is available to you. Or perhaps you want to add breakfast or extend your stay with a full day. Changes to the booking can be made by clicking below.
ADD EXTRA TIME
Find your Hotel on a map
Kensington Stay 1 Philbeach Gardens, London SW5 9DY, UK

Things to do

Take your time and get to know the city
We’ve gathered a set of tips on where to go and what to see in your destination. The tips include the places you need to see as well as hiden gems you'll fall in love with.
CHECK THE BEST TIPS
